Trade/Device Name(s): ReliOn Micro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GLUCOCARD 01 SENSOR PLUS Blood Glucose Test Strips
ReliOn Micro Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GLUCOCARD 01-mini and ReliOn Micro blood glucose monitoring systems and related test strips for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or palm for home use by persons with diabetes to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use; for single patient use only.
